# LogFunc delegate

```csharp
public delegate void LogFunc(string log_domain, LogLevelFlags log_level, string message, 
    IntPtr user_data);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| log_domain | Transfer ownership: none |
| log_level | Transfer ownership: none |
| message | Transfer ownership: none |
| user_data | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: none
